Works

A list of past and ongoing projects

  • 19 Aug, 2020, Tidal New Moon Marathon video.

  • 2020 New Instrument for Musical Expression Conference, Royal Birmingham Conservatoire video.

  • 1 March, 2019 Chunk No_reace, Algorave, Arkaoda, Istanbul video

  • 2019 PBU meets ICE: Laptop performance using networked music systems. Alberto de Campo (UdK, Berlin), Konstantinos Vasilakos, Onur Dağdeviren, Uğur Can Akkaya, Dystopia Festival, ITU, Istanbul.

  • 22 March, 2018 SurroundScapes II, (IAEwNoise, fixed media composition), Bomontiada, Istanbul Turkey.

  • 8 May, 2018 Performance with ICE and Scott Wilson (University of Birmingham), Maçka Elektrikli Müzik Günleri festival, ITU/TDMK.

  • 8 May, 2018 Dark Matter with Scott Wilson (University of Birmingham), ITU/TDMK.

  • 2018 A portrait interview ITU Corporate Communication Office, Istanbul.

  • 2017 Senior developer of IPSOS: Software Development for Sonification App.

  • 22 Jun, 2016 Art@CMS Summer Vernissage - CMS-point 5, CERN, Cessy, France trailer

  • 2016 Electric Nights Festival, Athens, Greece link

  • 2014 Power of the People, Keele Gallery, UK.
